author: alekstheod
message:
PR #33414: [ROCm] Add missing keepalive timeout for rbe builds in rocm

Imported from GitHub PR https://github.com/openxla/xla/pull/33414

üìù Summary of Changes
Set keepalive time to prevent connection drop from bazel client during rbe builds

üéØ Justification
Set keepalive time to prevent connection drop from bazel client during rbe builds

üöÄ Kind of Contribution
Please remove what does not apply: üêõ Bug Fix

üìä Benchmark (for Performance Improvements)
Not relevant

üß™ Unit Tests:
Not relevant

üß™ Execution Tests:
Not relevant

Copybara import of the project:

--
76a26b318dac967b17a64abfbbbb00ca26980b5a by Alexandros Theodoridis <atheodor@amd.com>:

Add missing keepalive timeout for rbe builds in rocm

Merging this change closes #33414

PiperOrigin-RevId: 829330372

files.patch:
@@ -12,6 +12,7 @@ build:rocm_rbe --bes_timeout=600s
 build:rocm_rbe --tls_client_certificate="/tf/certificates/ci-cert.crt"
 build:rocm_rbe --tls_client_key="/tf/certificates/ci-cert.key"
 build:rocm_rbe --spawn_strategy=remote,local
+build:rocm_rbe --grpc_keepalive_time=30s
 
 test:rocm_rbe --jobs=200
 test:rocm_rbe --remote_executor=grpcs://wardite.cluster.engflow.com
@@ -73,4 +74,4 @@ test:xla_mgpu -- \
 //xla/service:p2p_schedule_preparation_test \
 //xla/tools/multihost_hlo_runner:functional_hlo_runner_test \
 //xla/pjrt/distributed:topology_util_test \
-//xla/pjrt/distributed:client_server_test 
\ No newline at end of file
+//xla/pjrt/distributed:client_server_test
